question_text:
Dale bought two rolls of tape. The first roll had 2.97 metres of tape and the second roll had 6.01 metres of tape. How many metres of tape did Dale buy in all?
___ metres
solution: Add the numbers of metres. Remember to line up the decimal points.
Dale bought 8.98 metres of tape in all.
